header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Decorating, Murder Mystery evening, food, girls weekend away, family holidays, hospital/operations, dogs/pets, dentists, pay/wages, making a complaint,
header.activity: Catching up with close friend and my daughter over lunch.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, anecdote telling
